description: A minimal test of a Slack bot agent with basic memory and file management capabilities.

userStories.title: Project Structure Setup
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the basic project structure and dependencies set up so I can start implementing features.

userStories.title: Memory Block System
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a simple memory block storage system so the agent can maintain state.
acceptanceCriteria: Implement get_memory(name) and set_memory(name, value) functions
Initialize with default memory blocks: persona, bot_values

userStories.title: Basic Slack Bot Connection
userStories.description: As a user, I need the bot to connect to Slack so I can send it messages.
acceptanceCriteria: Create src/slack_bot.py with Slack Socket Mode setup

userStories.title: File Management Tools
userStories.description: As an agent, I need basic file management so I can read and write state files.
acceptanceCriteria: Implement read_file(path) and write_file(path, content) functions
Restrict operations to state/ directory for safety
Add error handling for missing files
